website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable disposable swim diaper that fits securely without pinching or chafing your baby.
pros: Won't chafe your baby's legs or swell up with water
Slides on and off like pants
Stretchy enough to enable your child to move freely
cons: Will not hold urine as well as a reusable swim diaper

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbent at all
customer_reviews.text: It's not absorbent and doesn't really hold poop that well in the pool. Our toddler peed in it before we go to the pool and it completely leaked out in the car seat as if she wasn't wearing a diaper. She also pooped in the pool once and when we opened the diaper there was remnants but it must have all leaked out so they had to clean the pool. It's really not that great but I don't know what else to use for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Swin Diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are really good swim diapers! They are not supposed to hold in much urine or stool, so what I do is that I change by son into the swim diapers right when we are going to get him in the water and change him back into regular diapers when we are out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Liset

customer_reviews.title: Huggies little swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Fit my one year great! The size small did match the weight unlike the pampers brand of little swimmers, they held up for the whole day and helped not make accident leak out into the pool. The size will also fit her next summer. I didn't have to get another size even when she went up a diaper size. Definitely worth the price I only had to buy one pack for the whole summer and even shared a few with some friends! Still have some left over and we went swimming alot! I was also able to let them sit out and dry and reuse them! For times she was only in our pool for a few minutes 😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: These don't hold water
customer_reviews.text: Oh, I did not like these at all. My daughter was wearing them at the buffet on the resort to which we traveled, before heading to the pool. She was sitting in a high chair and I noticed she was getting fussy. When I looked, there was a pool underneath the highchair and the seat was completely soaked. She peed and the stupid swimmer could e even hold in one bathroom use. I was mortified. We had to cover her in a beach towel and change her poolside. Thank goodness we were just about done at breakfast. For the rest of the trip, I didn't put the swimmers on until she was ready to go in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size small which is 15-24 lbs & received a diaper 15-34 lbs. Way too big for what I needed. BEWARE of sizes not being what is shown.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: These have worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great so far. I haven't had to pay a pool cleaning fee for a leaky loose diaper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Romo

customer_reviews.title: "Small" in description, size "3-4" is what you receive.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size "small" which said15lbs-25lbs. The package I received said size "3-4 15lbs-34lbs." Would not have ordered knowing it was a size 3-4 with such a large weight range. Decieving online description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: They work, but don’t like the Velcro on the sides, there was a spot I didn’t notice was not covered by the diaper and the Velcro piece was rubbing my babies side to the point it was red :( other than that they do the job!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna C.

customer_reviews.title: No More Soaked Diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I always have a couple these in our day bag; you just never know when you might find some water! They stay on tight, and my son is on the smaller end of small size. For reference he fits is 18 mths. pants well. They look like they grab te waist and legs well, and I have yet to have them come off in moving water.
customer_reviews.author: And the Con

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well for my 1 year old. I feel like they fit true to size and they absorb really well. I feel like swimmers are a must have during swimming season! And definitely can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved these! Very durable
customer_reviews.text: We used these for vacation. They fit great and lead me to switch from pampers to huggies for every day use. They are easy to rip off and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rasalla

customer_reviews.title: Not absorbing
customer_reviews.text: If your holding your child and they pee you WILL be peed on. They do not absorb anything
customer_reviews.author: Skingraphix

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works in a pinch like the washable reusable ones better
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 19lb babygirl , doesn’t irritate her either. Also received three days sooner than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: No poop in the pool so we are happy customers
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as size 3-4 on the website but when I received the package it says up to size 3. False advertising for product and the picture does not match the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you need - and you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you need - and you don't have to go on a run to the store. Winner all round.
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product I received. I received Huggins little swimmers, but instead of receiving the smalls that I ordered, I received a size 3-4 which are larger than the baby smalls that I wanted. Disappointed since you can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Mandu132426

customer_reviews.title: The straps on the side can be adjusted
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves the diapers. Its comfortable and super absorbent. I've used it several times and I'm planning on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: They do the job with no fuss!
customer_reviews.text: They do the job with no fuss! My kid pooped a few times in these and it didn't make a mess in the pool. She is about average size and filled the diaper out well.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to do the trick. Diapers for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to do the trick. Not sure if baby peed so I cant speak about its effectiveness. But it is a diaper that can be worn in water which is what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: These hold pee in! Not all swim diapers do this. Good quality and quantity for the price
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Holds up a lot better than other brand
customer_reviews.text: I've used these and another brand and these were so much better I almost want to just toss out the other ones. These lasted the entire pool play time and didn't puff up from water absorbed. If they cost a few extra bucks, its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, they work!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, have had zero problems with these and they are stylish. Sizing are as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They served their purpose to keep in potty from pool. I should've gone to the store instead they were -$5 at store
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great Swimming product.
customer_reviews.text: They did their job and didn't let any bodily fluids out into the body of water.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Haggblom

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well for our 5 month old, they have ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked Well for our 5 month old, they have adjustable sides so even though they were a little big for him, we where able to adjust them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized bigger than it says
customer_reviews.text: My baby never had a bm in the diaper so I can't tell you how well it holds in solids and obviously urine leaks through being a swim diaper. But it was also a bit too large for my 3 month old, who is in the weight range it claims to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning: these are not meant to contain pee, ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning: these are not meant to contain pee, only poop. AKA if you try to get your child ready for swimming lessons at home and they go while in their carseat, you may have a mess. Other than that, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for babies
customer_reviews.text: Really great deal and they’re amazing for babies to wear. Used them all summer long
customer_reviews.author: CinSam

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that the sides can be unattached and reattached. It makes it so much easier to put them on. Held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must for the pool. They fit true to size and I like how the sides can be readjusted with the Velcro tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Royal

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small and received size 3-4. Will not be able to use them for awhile. DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Can fit smaller babies just fine
customer_reviews.text: I used the adjustable tabs on the sides in order for these to fit my 3 mo old (9 lbs). The diapers come up high on her tummy but still work well.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge fan of disposable swim diapers.
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of disposable swim diapers. They sag a lot but they work if you stay on top of changing them throughout a day at the beach or lake
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect. true to size of diaper.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect perfect. Great for your littles to swim in .
customer_reviews.author: Channingandcourtney

customer_reviews.title: Bad cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bad diaper . The cover had scratches and it surely looked some cheap duplicate material . Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Seens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and the diapers were perfect for our little ones first experience in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ml

customer_reviews.title: Good fit over months
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and work well. My baby has been wearing these since he was 2.5 months and is now 4.5 months and they've fit the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of huggies in general. The little swimmers are perfect for little ones learning to love the water.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Traynor

customer_reviews.title: Sides are adjustable so it's easy to make it fit your little one
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and were just what we needed for our daughter's swimming class. Sides are adjustable so it's easy to make it fit your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Preppy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love to take my grand baby to the pool "safe"
customer_reviews.author: CBN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great as long as child doesn't go number 2. No complaints. Fit well and didn't swell up.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Byrd

customer_reviews.title: No Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my daughter and now for my son. Never had any leaks. Hold up great in the water, and they are cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hanns

customer_reviews.title: Good swim diaper
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that these would be a little large on my daughter, but these were the smallest size I could find, so I bought them. She is 13.5 lbs and these worked very well for her. FYI the size isn't adjustable like a regular diaper, they are a pull up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The legs are very loose, and stuff leaks out the side.
customer_reviews.author: Clair Fedderly

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job! These diapers are quite soft and stretchy. They work but without the bulk of a normal diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson House

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get these swim diapers in time for ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to get these swim diapers in time for my great granddaughters visit. I was running out of time for another trip to store and this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the baby swimmers!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Small fit my 18lb four month old who wears size 3-4 diapers!
customer_reviews.author: leighms

customer_reviews.title: These were great for swimming for my daughter - probably should come ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great for swimming for my daughter - probably should come with a warning for forgetful new parents trying to feed a bottle right after swimming "does not hold water or pee, prepared to get peed on"
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for kids. my son loves to wear and enjoys in the pool daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Medidi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Gotta love delivery to your door and saving money!!
customer_reviews.author: t sokolowski

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made a smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: They're too big for my two month old, but I knew they were going to be. It's not a defect of the product itself; rather, the brand as it's the smallest size they make. The Pampers brand were no better. It seems as though children under 16lbs don't swim, apparently. The tabs on the side did allow me to adjust it some. So long as my son didn't have any runny messes, it would work. He didn't stay in the water too long, so it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I am very satisfied w the product...
customer_reviews.author: Ana R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not the size shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the picture showed size 3-4 and I was looking for the smallest diapers available. What arrived was size S, which is larger, I don't believe Huggies makes 3-4 any more. Was going to return them but kept them as I figured we may use them at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Anigriv

customer_reviews.title: Great swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: Great swim diapers!! FYI swim diapers only hold poop, not pee! These diapers are easy to get on and easy to get off. Use them weekly for my sons swim lessons. He has been using this size since 6 months, he is now 14 months, 20 lbs and the small still fit him perfectly with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good product for small baby
customer_reviews.text: These are good. They were able to fit my small 4 month old baby who weighs 11lbs. I felt safe putting her in the water without an accident in the pool spoiling the water. Though she also wore a swim bottom on as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great throw-away swim diaper option. It's soft fabric and doesn't chaff skin. I haven't yet had a child ever poop in one while swimming but I'm sure it would keep it in well. I tried those washable swim diapers to be better for the environment but the fabric is rough and they never seem to fit right.
customer_reviews.author: SSSM

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I missed something. Are these not diapers? Because they absorb NOTHING! I put the swim pant on my son right before we went to his swim lesson and he was soaking wet within 20 minutes! when I saw that urine soaked completely through his pants I questioned whether or not I forgot to put the Swim pant on. Well I had, it just did nothing like putting him in underpants. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amber T

customer_reviews.title: They work as they should
customer_reviews.text: The pool that we take our son to requires swim diapers. They serve their purpose, they don't get soggy and so far they hold poop in.
customer_reviews.author: JAM4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what they're intended
customer_reviews.text: You need to put them on your baby just before he/she is going into the pool and take them off immediately after. As long as they're used that way, they do what they're supposed to. They fit nicely and comfortably and are very easy to take off.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: They pulled up and then ... you won't believe it ... they pulled down. These diapers are so good, every time I took them off, I couldn't even find any poo. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jerkey

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong Diapers
customer_reviews.text: I also received the pink set of these diapers which is not what is being advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: I assumed these would be gender neutral, as I didn't see anything specific. Disappointed when they showed up in bubblegum pink, when my LO is boy...
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: These are swim diapers for girls
customer_reviews.text: I have a little boy. These diapers are pink and have Ariel and Minne Mouse on them. It would have been nice to have known these are girl diapers before I bought them, they just say Features Disney and Pixar designs in pink and blue colors. Colors may vary but I didn't think it would be that much! I can't even use them.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing pads EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I leak a lot and have tried lansinoh, medela, and washable pads and these are by far the best. Soft, thin, large coverage, and nice tapered edges. Just perfect. Seriously. Don't waste your time with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoexercise

customer_reviews.title: Work fine for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Work fine for the purpose, but are a bit expensive. Throw away if your child has a BM, but otherwise you can rinse and reuse these at least 4-5 times each. Helps keep the cost down and extra diapers out of the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: aaa35

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for a small infant
customer_reviews.text: This item was described as blue and pink and was most not pink in any way. Additionally it was described as being size Small, however it is in fact a size 3-4, made for infants weighing 15-35 pounds. No suitable for an infant who wears Huggies size small.
customer_reviews.author: Mongoose79

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 6 month old. She’s got some serious chunky legs and they fit her nicely, better than her normal diapers. They work great for swim lessons. Easy to put on and take off and hold all the waste inside, nothing goes into the pool. Pure magic!
customer_reviews.author: Jon & Leah

customer_reviews.title: My son is 4 months old weighs 16. 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 months old weighs 16.3 pounds and he fits in these. We are so excited for summer!! Thanks Huggies!!
customer_reviews.author: Aerial Forester

customer_reviews.title: These swim diapers worked great and were easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: These swim diapers worked great and were easy to get on and off. We didn't ever have any major events (read: poops), so it's hard to say if they would have been great when put to the test, but for us, they did the job. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great when my child goes for his baby swim class. I have not tested it on how well it holds a poop in since my child has not pooped while swimming yet... but so far it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: skytrekker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pool
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying these because I heard that Huggies were not great diapers. However, many customers were pleased with these swimming diapers, so I had to buy them and try them out for my baby girl. She's almost 16 pounds and they fit well. I have used them in the pool 3 times now and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: JCT

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the pool and beach. They are very easy to get off because you rip off at the sides.
customer_reviews.author: LKC

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of crap but never dishes it out!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Keeps the pool looking crystal clear no matter what happens inside the diaper!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Did what they were supposed to do. Hold in SOLIDS and didn’t swell in the water. We changed about every hour or so if we were in the water to prevent any possible yeast infection due to sitting in a wet diaper in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Alvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool diapers! We had peepee and poopoo while wearing these, and never a mess! These are the diapers you want for the pool, i used medium for a one year old who is in the 80th percentile, make sure you read the pound for each size and you are good
customer_reviews.author: Midnite2four

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and worked well in the pool. Exactly as expected and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but over priced
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product and have been using them for awhile in my daughter's swim class. I have zero complaints BUT I recommend that y'all price shop. These are way over priced. I got the package with a sticker on it that said $1.25 which makes me think they bought it at the dollar store. Plus you can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: they worked great!
customer_reviews.text: They fit my grandson. He’s just three months old and I couldn’t find a smaller size than M which started at 24 lbs. he’s only 14 lbs. they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Devine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the pool for a fun outing or for swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: kristian

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product does the job nicely. Tip: Don't leave your baby in them too long, the chlorine in pool can irritate your baby's behind. Once they are going to be out of the water for more than 15/20 minutes change the diaper. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great hold. 1 year wore these for hours at the pool and never had a poo leak. They have tabs but easily pull on and off as well like an underwear. Fit perfect and didnt give him a puffy diaper butt! :-) Can only find these on Amazon and free shipping great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: Great swim diapers! My favorite part is they are labelled for front and back (not always clear which side is which on a swim diaper)!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Overall good item.
customer_reviews.text: The Diapers worked out really well. They were a little big on my 6 month baby, but no biggie since she'll be fitting into them soon! The package arrived on time for our mini-vacation. I was surprised at how light my baby was as I carried her out of the pool. She didn't soil the diaper, so I can't give out any information on whether it leaks or not. Overall good item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barba

customer_reviews.title: Great swimmers
customer_reviews.text: Great little swimmers. I'm not sure if they truly worked or not but I didn't notice any pee and they definitely absorbed differently than regular diapers.
customer_reviews.author: SportyJ

customer_reviews.title: Not Unisex (Received Ariel for Baby Boy)
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us, but it says "characters vary." I received Arial, princesses for my first trip to the beach with my little boy. I thought it was my mistake, but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable tabs are great
customer_reviews.text: These were great for our first vacation with our 3-month old. I would give them 5 stars if they were available in a smaller size, but with the adjustable tabs we were able to make this bigger size work.
customer_reviews.author: natron

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: They worked great on vacation while in the hotel pool. Our baby was almost one year old when we used them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: These definitely do the job for my 9 month old. Holds in the mess and still allows her to feel free to swim and play.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Relyea

customer_reviews.title: These keep my little water baby ship-shape and sea worthy ...
customer_reviews.text: These keep my little water baby ship-shape and sea worthy while on the boat. I forgot to bring an extra diaper and these held for well for the necessary time.
customer_reviews.author: Lakebeard&LadyRedbush

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for our 8 Month Old Swimmer
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for our little swimmer. We use them twice a week at swim lessons, and they have never let us down.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Swim diapers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice diapers for swimming. Fits well even though my child is now almost 12 kgs. I thought the small size wouldn't fit. If only the price were lower :)
customer_reviews.author: Zorrogirl

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Easy to get on and off, light weight, and fit well. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: P-Town Mama

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Worked AMAZING! No water got in her diaper. My little girl weighs around 17 pounds and this was PERFECT for her!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Traktman-Pelissier

customer_reviews.title: kinda sucks they only came in blue
customer_reviews.text: They're ok, kinda sucks they only came in blue, people at her swim class always think she's a boy
customer_reviews.author: äNg¡€

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are great for my baby. we swim all the time and they hold up and really work
customer_reviews.author: d haas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Fit well, easy to put on, and can tear from the side if needed to take it off without making a mess! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great, but cheaper to just buy them in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Pretzels&Gum

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these swim diapers do not swell up! i figured they would a little but they don't, love it!!! would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MOORE

product_meta.title: Huggies Little Swimmers Disposable Swim Diapers, Small, 12-Count - Pink/Blue
product_meta.description:
Huggies Little Swimmers Disposable Swim Diapers, Small, 12-Count - Pink/Blue

BRAND STORY
By Huggies

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
